Title: Prohibits an owner from adjusting the amount of preferential rent upon the renewal of a lease
Summary: Prohibits an owner from adjusting the amount of preferential rent, rent charged and paid by the tenant which is less than the legal regulated rent for the housing accommodation, upon the renewal of a lease; only allows the owner to make such adjustments upon a vacancy which is not the result of the failure of the owner to maintain a habitable residence.
LawCode: Amd ยง10, Emerg Ten Prot Act of 1974; amd ยง26-511, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the emergency tenant protection act of nineteen seventy-four and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the regulation of rents
